desc: Craft Club gives you the kick you need to get started with cross-stitching and rug making. Explore the wide range of cross stitch kits in our online store. Get inspired and keep your hands busy. This is only the beginning of your crafting journey. Enjoy the convenience of shopping with us. We deliver Canada wide.

layout.text: Whether you're taking time for yourself or stuck at home, a Craft Club kit is the perfect way to stay crafty. Our kits are all locally designed and include free shipping across Canada.
